Reviews.Content: Nice hotel Although room was small, it was very nice and clean. It's conveniently located in the heart of Ginza, 15 min walk from Tokyo station, on a quiet street. There was tea in the room, nice tv, fridge; bathrob, night shirts and slipper were given, as well as bunch of toiletries, really didn't need to bring any of my own. Teh staff was friendly and helpful. We enjoyed our stay there!
Reviews.Author: yummynat

Reviews.Content: Great Hotel in the heart of Ginza Convenientely located in the heart of Ginza, this small boutique hotel offers great service and extremely clean rooms. The room we had was small but very comfy and cozy. The staff are very friendly and helpful. The location is excellent, just a couple of minutes walk to the subway. and about 20 minutes walk to Tokyo Station. A taxi ride from Tokyo Station was approximately 700-800 Yen. Close to the hotel there is an excellent italian restaurant (Mario). The only disappointment is that breakfast is expensive and not included in the price. However, there are plenty of good cafe's around if you are on a budget.
Reviews.Author: Gianna-Richard

Reviews.Content: Wonderful Hotel In Ginza A small boutique hotel in the absolute center of Ginza, Tokyo. I stayed here for two days a had a wonderful time. As always in Tokyo the staff at the reception give first class service. It is a wonderful which is very very clean and with with everything you need in the rooms. Could have had a little better flatscreen tv. You can't beat the location.
Reviews.Author: 1globetrotterSweden

Reviews.Content: Great value for money!       Outside of Hotel
Reviews.Author: latte_fan

Reviews.Content: Vey small, very uncomfy We stayed at this hotel for 2 nights (should have been 3 but couldn't cope another night). The hotel staff were very friendly and the hotel was clean. The problems were that the rooms were very very small, you basically had to climb over each other to get in and out, the beds were very uncomfy, the pillows felt like there was rice in them, and to top it off the building joined to the left of the hotel was being refurbished, which they did through the day and night, so we had no sleep what so ever, the air conditioning didn't seem to blow out any cold air either and due to the work on the building next door we couldn't have the windows open. This is no way a 4* hotel, was very dissapointed. Do not stay here if you are claustraphobic.
Reviews.Author: kellyjames7
